0089a81e2c471ceefb6c1cff763d23941dce6063.query:
SELECT wallet 
                    FROM network_monitoring_users
                    WHERE run_id = $1
                    AND secondary2spid = $2
                    ORDER BY user_id 
                    OFFSET $3
                    LIMIT $4;

058ebc6a1ca1ea4563a742a90926375f34a40688.query:
SELECT wallet 
                    FROM network_monitoring_users
                    WHERE run_id = $1
                    AND primaryspid = $2
                    ORDER BY user_id 
                    OFFSET $3
                    LIMIT $4;

0e0475819a25d1179b545be7dcb2389157f56641.query:
INSERT INTO network_monitoring_cids_from_discovery (cid, run_id, ctype, user_id)
        SELECT metadata_multihash, $1, 'metadata', owner_id
        FROM discovery.tracks
        WHERE metadata_multihash IS NOT NULL
        AND is_current = TRUE;

20f32d0f6c9573583392ecde77cc200f07274f0f.query:
INSERT INTO network_monitoring_index_blocks (
            is_current, 
            blocknumber, 
            is_complete,
            created_at
        ) VALUES (
            TRUE,
            $1,
            FALSE,
            NOW()
        )
        RETURNING run_id;

2210ca5695404e388c5577666816e5f62f09bf4f.query:
INSERT INTO network_monitoring_cids_from_discovery (cid, run_id, ctype, user_id)
        SELECT
            jsonb_array_elements(track_segments) -> 'multihash',
            $1,
            'track',
            owner_id
        FROM discovery.tracks
        WHERE track_segments IS NOT NULL
        AND is_current = TRUE;

22d12668eca4d93d8cf79924511bff01ffdce3d0.query:
UPDATE network_monitoring_users as nm_users
                    SET secondary2_clock_value = tmp.clock
                    FROM UNNEST($2::text[], $3::int[]) AS tmp(wallet, clock)
                    WHERE nm_users.wallet = tmp.wallet
                    AND nm_users.run_id = $1;

24927607451b3ef6dac72293ac7a73df79987e54.query:
INSERT INTO network_monitoring_cids_from_discovery (cid, run_id, ctype, user_id)
        SELECT cover_art, $1, 'image', owner_id
        FROM discovery.tracks
        WHERE cover_art IS NOT NULL
        AND is_current = TRUE;

48e897bb8855616f347a3c67df8c8df6f4dc43a5.query:
INSERT INTO network_monitoring_cids_from_discovery (cid, run_id, ctype, user_id)
        SELECT metadata_multihash, $1, 'metadata', user_id
        FROM discovery.users
        WHERE metadata_multihash IS NOT NULL
        AND is_current = TRUE;

5da0708585db842b9c0a7ddbbd5be748969455f2.query:
INSERT INTO network_monitoring_cids_from_discovery (cid, run_id, ctype, user_id)
        SELECT cover_photo, $1, 'image', user_id
        FROM discovery.users
        WHERE cover_photo IS NOT NULL
        AND is_current = TRUE;

68a9cc63f2ebe73cb2639bb12020e87e2dd63cb2.query: SELECT number FROM discovery.blocks WHERE is_current = TRUE LIMIT 1;

6e518576b776b2933318b0ba394e1809f5a48aa0.query:
INSERT INTO network_monitoring_users (
            user_id,
            wallet,
            replica_set,
            run_id,
            primarySpID,
            secondary1SpID,
            secondary2SpID
        )
        SELECT
            user_id,
            wallet,
            creator_node_endpoint as replica_set,
            $1,
            primary_id as primarySpID,
            secondary_ids[1] as secondary1SpID,
            secondary_ids[2] as secondary2SpID
        FROM discovery.users
        WHERE is_current = TRUE;

7ada7305aa2ccbe5c1eac6011c54b50a1b27be32.query: CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS postgres_fdw;

8bef028ac8c2e732b07f15c5b789f859665cc35f.query:
SELECT primary_group.spid as spid, primary_count, secondary1_count, secondary2_count
        FROM (
            (
                SELECT primaryspid AS spid, COUNT(*) AS primary_count
                FROM network_monitoring_users 
                WHERE run_id = $1
                GROUP BY primaryspid
            ) as primary_group
            JOIN 
            (
                SELECT secondary1spid AS spid, COUNT(*) AS secondary1_count 
                FROM network_monitoring_users 
                WHERE run_id = $1
                GROUP BY secondary1spid
            ) secondary1_group
            ON primary_group.spid = secondary1_group.spid
            JOIN
            (
                SELECT secondary2spid AS spid, COUNT(*) AS secondary2_count 
                FROM network_monitoring_users 
                WHERE run_id = $1
                GROUP BY secondary2spid
            ) secondary2_group
            ON primary_group.spid = secondary2_group.spid
        )
        WHERE primary_group.spid = $2;

a99f8841477a648e36b15823a637e1dac5075874.query:
UPDATE network_monitoring_users as nm_users
                    SET secondary1_clock_value = tmp.clock
                    FROM UNNEST($2::text[], $3::int[]) AS tmp(wallet, clock)
                    WHERE nm_users.wallet = tmp.wallet
                    AND nm_users.run_id = $1;

be244fdf46a47897fd954e274ed06f097edeaa9b.query:
INSERT INTO network_monitoring_cids_from_discovery (cid, run_id, ctype, user_id)
        SELECT download -> 'cid' as cid, $1, 'track', owner_id
        FROM discovery.tracks
        WHERE download -> 'cid' != 'null'
        AND is_current = TRUE;

cde9625ab5b6b0bff681d06a3203242e510d55e7.query:
UPDATE network_monitoring_users as nm_users
                    SET primary_clock_value = tmp.clock
                    FROM UNNEST($2::text[], $3::int[]) AS tmp(wallet, clock)
                    WHERE nm_users.wallet = tmp.wallet
                    AND nm_users.run_id = $1;

d4f48dec146a4db05973d31f0a0d0a51902e6afd.query:
INSERT INTO network_monitoring_cids_from_discovery (cid, run_id, ctype, user_id)
        SELECT cover_art_sizes, $1, 'dir', owner_id
        FROM discovery.tracks
        WHERE cover_art_sizes IS NOT NULL
        AND is_current = TRUE;

dc4c5909a6ea159554fb8765f8e763c2b9fe29d2.query:
IMPORT FOREIGN SCHEMA "public"
        LIMIT
                TO (users, tracks, blocks, ursm_content_nodes)
        FROM
                SERVER fdw_server_connection INTO discovery;

dd3329af9e97a44fe0e9e07274c2792276a67772.query: DROP SCHEMA IF EXISTS discovery CASCADE;

ddd5ad17051e8b1bf67683c07e0b43692d73be9d.query:
SELECT wallet 
                    FROM network_monitoring_users
                    WHERE run_id = $1
                    AND secondary1spid = $2
                    ORDER BY user_id 
                    OFFSET $3
                    LIMIT $4;

ef58c67355a4d92c5a294b40a87e6c75e8ab2088.query:
INSERT INTO network_monitoring_cids_from_discovery (cid, run_id, ctype, user_id)
        SELECT profile_picture, $1, 'image', user_id
        FROM discovery.users
        WHERE profile_picture IS NOT NULL
        AND profile_picture != '0'
        AND user_id IS NOT NULL
        AND is_current = TRUE;
